text: The Barrie Colts are an ice hockey team in the Ontario Hockey League (OHL). They are based in Barrie, Ontario, Canada. The Barrie Colts first became a team when they played in the junior division of the OHA from 1907 until 1910 which was prior to the creation of junior A and junior B levels. They joined the OHL on May 6, 1994 when they joined as an expansion franchise. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1994 establishments in Canada Category:Ice hockey teams in Ontario Category:Ontario Hockey League teams
title: Barrie Colts
